algorithm_technique: Two pointers to find ascending and descending slopes
problem_summary_simple: Check if an array strictly increases then strictly decreases, with at least 3 elements.
problem_summary_technical: Verify array strictly increases to a peak, then strictly decreases, requiring at least 3 elements and a valid peak.
key_insights: The core idea is to find the peak by iterating from the start and end.
The peak must not be at the beginning or end of the array.
The array must strictly increase and then strictly decrease.
